Verdict.name: Verdict
Verdict.description: A weapon once used by a young maiden who forsook her family name, stained with the blood of enemies and loved ones both.
Verdict.effectName: Many Oaths of Dawn and Dusk
Verdict.effectDescription: Increases ATK by 20%. When party members obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 18%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
